page.title: 18Hobbies and Interests i
page.content: {Pop Music} Pop Music is one of the main interests of the young people of Great Horwood. Two of the favourite groups are Duran Duran and Wham. Top of the Pops is one of the most popular television programmes. {Magazines} There are magazines for all ages. The younger children like comics such as {Beano},{Dandy},{Twinkle},{Bunty} and {Playhour}.Whereas the older children prefer magazines such as {My Guy}, {Girl}, {Jackie} and {Smash Hits}.The latter is the most popular amongst the twelve year olds. {Make Up} Make Up was once an interest strictly for girls, but the fashion for male pop stars to wear it has led to the boys trying to copy {Boy George}.
